name: Mobile Pay BD
author: #Mahadi8457

sections.description:
This is a cool plugin to integrate a payment gateway in any WooCommerce based website to process nagad payment. It is lightweight and easy to use.

Please note:
– This is a WooCommerce based plugin, so WooCommerce plugin must be activated before active this plugin.
– You must have a nagadaccount to get payments.

Using the Plugin

  • Download the plugin, install and active.

  • Click on Settings or go to WooCommerce > Settings > Woo nagad,

  • Now you will see few default setup. You must fill up nagad account number and account type and also adjust other fields to get payment.

  • That’s it. You are ready to go!
sections.installation:
Installation process is very easy. Follow the steps bellow:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly by search nagad.
  2. Then activate the plugin.
  3. Click on Setting or Go to WooCommerce > settings > checkout > nagad and setup your necessary settings.
sections.faq:
What is nagad?

nagad is a very dynamic and secure digital financial service that facilitates customersâ€™ daily financial transaction needs like cash-in, cash-out, send money, mobile recharge etc.

Is it WooCommerce dependent plugins?

Yes, You must install and active WooCommerce plugins before active this plugin.

Is nagad merchant account is necessary for this plugins?

No, it could be personal or agent account.

Is it secured?

100%, Maintained high level validation in both front-end and back-end.

  • Bug Fix

2.1

  • Added Nagad payment system
